info.name: tutorial-laravel-attributes
info.description:
TransferCab API Collection

This collection contains all API endpoints for the TransferCab platform.

Features:
- Dynamic model-based endpoints
- Automatic CRUD operations
- Filtering, sorting, field selection, includes
- Raw JSON body generation (typed) for Create/Update
- Bearer token authentication with pre-request script

Generated on: 2025-12-01 12:23:44

query.description: Allowed includes: currency, category, images, imageTranslations, translations, videos, videoTranslations
